claimedAmount The amount already claimed for this index.
timestamp The timestamp when vesting was initialized for this index (0 if not initialized).

params.initializationDeadline_: The timestamp after which no new vesting can be initialized.
params.name_: The human-readable name for this airdrop.
params.owner_: The initial owner of the contract.
params.root_: The Merkle root for verifying claims.
params.token_: The address of the ERC20 token to be distributed.
params.vestingStrategy_: The address of the vesting strategy contract for vesting calculations.

params.index: The index of the claim in the Merkle tree.

params.totalAmount: The total amount allocated for this index.

returns._0: claimed True if the index has been fully claimed, false otherwise.

The Merkle root for verifying airdrop claims.
The human-readable name of the airdrop.

returns._0: The ERC20 token being distributed.
The vesting strategy contract.

params.to: The address to send the withdrawn tokens to.

merkleRoot().notice: Returns the Merkle root for verifying airdrop claims.

name().notice: Returns the name of this airdrop.

token().notice: Returns the token being distributed in this airdrop.

vestingStrategy().notice: Returns the current vesting strategy contract.

withdrawTokens(address).notice: Allows the owner to withdraw any tokens remaining in the contract.

InitializationDeadlinePassed().notice: Error indicating that the initialization deadline has passed and no new vesting can be initialized.

InvalidInitializationDeadline().notice: Error indicating that an invalid initialization deadline was provided.

InvalidVestingStrategy(address).notice: Error indicating that the provided vesting strategy is invalid for this use case.

InvalidVestingStrategyAddress().notice: Error indicating that an invalid vesting strategy address was provided.

VestingAirdropImplementationNotSet().notice: Error indicating that the vesting airdrop implementation is not set or invalid.

VestingAlreadyInitialized().notice: Error indicating that vesting has already been initialized for the specified index.

VestingNotInitialized().notice: Error indicating that vesting has not been initialized for the specified index.

ZeroAmountToTransfer().notice: Error indicating that there are zero tokens available to transfer.

userdoc.notice: Defines the core functionality for a vesting airdrop contract that uses pluggable claim strategies in the ATK Protocol.

devdoc.details: This interface extends IATKAirdrop and defines a two-phase vesting airdrop process:      1. `initializeVesting` or `batchInitializeVesting`: User proves their allocation and starts the vesting clock.      2. `claim` or `batchClaim`: User claims the vested portion of their tokens at any time after initialization.
